r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n:
This is a patch update to the PHP 2.0 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-318: Fix append/prepend operations failing on new libcouchbase. * PCBC-319: Correct segfault when using persist_to/replicate_to. * Corrected typo in N1QL query interface.
